attributes.action: Ban 4x4's from car parks, town centres and anywhere apart from condidtions they are specifically built for ie: off road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Am I the only one fed up of being sqeezed off the road and out of car parks by 4x4s that don't need to be there?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
